Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or credible source provided to verify the claim that the creator of Super Mario condemned an image of Mario and Luigi kissing.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image of Mario and Luigi kissing is condemned by the creator of Super Mario without providing any evidence or statement from the creator to support this assumption.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the tweets shown in the misleading post are not from genuine, verified accounts, as stated by the expert.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the image of Mario and Luigi kissing by implying that it is a controversial or condemned act, without providing substantial evidence or context.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating biases in the claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting misleading information and not providing enough evidence to support its assertion.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation provided in the claim.
